name: Tillage Fever
description:
How to Play

You have to keep balance between your supply and your demand. You can do this by planting seeds of corn into the available tiles. If a seed successfully ends its life cycle you will be rewarded with lots of money from your clients! Each 5 days a tile change its current growth state, and you receive small amounts of money so you can keep your business running!

Be careful with supply-demand and marginal utility, don't sell tiles that are almost finishing their life cycle.

Issues

Please report any issue to the official issue tracker on github

Enjoy the game, post your thoughts! That's it, keep developing and until the next time!
